title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling Node.js and browser apps to chat, generate embeddings, pull models, and manage the local server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chatting, generating, embedding, listing, pulling, and deleting models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that exposes Ollama as a chat, LLM, and embeddings provider with callback support for building RAG and agent workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring model switching, code highlighting, PDF uploads, multimodal vision, and role-play presets.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering fluent builders, streaming, and async support for Spring Boot and Android apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with ActiveModel-style interface for chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Python that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local LLM code completion and chat using Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with sidebar model selector, conversation export, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-kt
summary: Kotlin multiplatform SDK for Ollama supporting JVM, Android, and iOS targets with coroutines and serialization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building retrieval-augmented pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+, Unity, and Blazor with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, and GPU support for easy local deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio async runtime and Serde models for all endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with context-based cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in servers and threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama using Socket Mode for secure private deployments and slash commands.

title: ollama-datasets
summary: Curated collection of fine-tune datasets and conversion scripts to create GGUF models compatible with Ollama.
